name: Bionic (Vortex070, Parinith, Joer15, ChrispaulAlias)
description:
Description

Bionic is a third-person stealth game with platforming and puzzle-solving elements.

Goals:

The goal of the game is to solve the puzzle to get the Key parts and Key Cards. Once you get the required parts you can proceed to the Safe House

Hook:

In a post-apocalyptic world, guide Kira through stealthy puzzles and platforming challenges to reach the safe house.

3 Cs Character:

As Kira, a post-apocalyptic survivor, we take control. Her goal is to go to the Safe House.

Camera:

Third-person camera - player can able to look around, and the camera will adapt if it runs into an obstruction.
